name: Famicom Yarou 54-in-1
overview: Famicom Yarou is a series of Famicom cartridges and consoles released in the mid-2000's. There are five volumes, and each one has seven Inventor hacks. The 54-in-1 include all of the hacks from all five volumes, including some unlicensed games, and retains the DreamGEAR 75-in-1 menu song.
